 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמַס‎</span>, ?<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמַשׂ‎</span>] 

**verb 1.** ==load==. 

**2.** ==carry a load== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עמס‎</span> ***carry***; compare possibly Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***gravis et obscurus fuit dies*** ([[BDB#Frey|Frey]])); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעֲמֹס‎</span> [[Gen.44.13|Gen 44:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲמָסֿ‎</span> [[Ps.68.20|Ps 68:20]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹמְסִים‎</span> [[Neh.13.15|Neh 13:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹמְשִׂים‎</span> [[Neh.4.11|Neh 4:11]] (but see below); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹמְסֶיהָ‎</span> [[Zech.12.3|Zech 12:3]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲמֻסִים‎</span> [[Isa.46.3|Isa 46:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲמוּסוֺת‎</span> v[[Isa.46.1|Isa 46:1]] — 

**1.** ***load*** (object omitted) upon (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) ass [[Gen.44.13|Gen 44:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Neh.13.15|Neh 13:15]] so absolute [[Neh.4.11|Neh 4:11]], literally, si vera lectio (see [[BDB#Be|BeRy]] Ryle); but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמֻשִׁים‎</span> [[BDB#Ry|Ry]]<sup>Kau</sup>. 

**2.** ***carry a load*** [[Ps.68.20|Ps 68:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, for (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>) his people), ***carry as a load*** [[Zech.12.3|Zech 12:3]] (figurative), passive [[Isa.46.1|Isa 46:1]] (literal), v[[Isa.46.3|Isa 46:3]] (figurative). **\*\*****Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעְמִיס‎</span> [[1Kgs.12.11|1Kgs 12:11]] ***load*** upon (accusative of thing + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person) = [[2Chr.10.11|2Chr 10:11]].
